options.text: \\\begin{minipage}[t]{3in}A 300 mm beam with uniform cross-sectional area 30 mm$^2$ and Young's modulus 60 GPa is constrained to not displace at the ends $A$ and $B$; it experiences a 60 kN load to the left, 100 mm from $B$. What is the reaction force at $B$?\end{minipage}\quad\begin{minipage}[t]{3in}\vspace{-24pt}" width="600px" class="img-responsive center-block" /> \end{minipage}\vspace{-12pt}
